long_description: The performance hybrid design of the Diamondback Clarity 24 in. kids' bike provides a comfortable upright riding position and speedy efficiency for everyday road riding. Light aluminum frame offers durable performance; the sloped top tube accommodates shorter riders. 14 gears handle all sorts of grades, making easy work of the ups, downs and arounds; chainring guard helps protect clothing from getting caught in the crankset. Shimano Revo twist shifters are easy to use-all kids have to do is twist the grip-integrated shifters to change gears. Linear-pull brakes supply sure stopping power and speed management; brake levers are sized for small hands. The rear derailleur hanger on the Diamondback Clarity 24 in. kids' bike can be easily replaced, helping extend the usable life of the frame. Specs are subject to change.
